name: Idle Restaurant Tycoon: Empire
description:
Have you ever wondered how to be an effective restaurant manager millionaire? Find it out with this new idle restaurant game!

Be an Idle Restaurant Tycoon - Build a food empire
Manage your restaurant and idle profit.
Make a strategy on how to become rich, renovate restaurants and build your empire!
Play the best cooking simulator!

No need of endless tapping

If you are tired of tapping games and you are looking for one that is not like the other clicker simulators - this is the right game for you!

Create your own idle tycoon restaurant story
Hire the best master chef, choose your staff, manage finances and become a great manager.
Expand your idle tycoon millionaire cooking empire with this restaurant game.
Cooking adventure with worldwide locations and better and better cooks and staff at every level.

Discover new kitchen stories
Discover the management strategy to invest in and earn as much cash as possible in this simulator - online and offline! Level up to open new kitchen stories.

Make renovations and build your empire tycoon.
Become a millionaire manager in this idle game.

Our restaurant game is not a clicker game like all the other tapping games.

Start your cooking adventure

With our cooking simulator, you can create your own restaurant story with the strategy you want and become an idle empire tycoon owner.

Download Idle Restaurant Tycoon now

With every step at Idle Restaurant Tycoon, you and your chef will prepare, cook, and serve tasty food. Make your customers happy to win more money and renovate your kitchen.

Profit from money investment to boost your economy and become rich!
Hire the best staff available, manage wages and income!
Build up your idle empire!
This is not a clicker game, so no need for a lot of tapping!
Create your own restaurant story with your strategy!
Attract customers and advance your business!
Discover new kitchen stories!
Increase your money online or offline in this tycoon game!
Cook, Level Up, Unlock, and Collect!

Forget about the other tapping games where you need to click all the time to make a profit. Our Idle Cooking Simulator is not a usual clicker game.

New type of restaurant story gaming

Get the best cook for each different cuisine you will have.
Upgrade your chef, your kitchen and your staff.
Make customers happier and expand your idle tycoon business.
Become the best millionaire restaurant manager.

Find the best strategy for your cooking adventure and grow your idle empire. Download now and start your adventure!
